Description: Example am307
INPUT
{
  message: {
  batteryLevel: 92,
  temperature: 20.8,
  humidity: 76,
  illumination: 254,
  pressure: 887.4,
  co2: 767
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  illuminance: { unitId: 'lx', record: 254 },
  co2Level: { unitId: 'ppm', record: 767 },
  temperature: { unitId: 'Cel', record: 20.8 },
  humidity: { unitId: '%RH', record: 76 },
  pressure: { unitId: 'hPa', record: 887.4 }
}

---------------------------------

Description: Example am319
INPUT
{
  message: {
  batteryLevel: 92,
  temperature: 20.8,
  humidity: 76,
  illumination: 254,
  pressure: 887.4,
  co2: 767
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  illuminance: { unitId: 'lx', record: 254 },
  co2Level: { unitId: 'ppm', record: 767 },
  temperature: { unitId: 'Cel', record: 20.8 },
  humidity: { unitId: '%RH', record: 76 },
  pressure: { unitId: 'hPa', record: 887.4 }
}
